3fad42be0fb2052bb404b989cc7d58b440cd23a0: The article compares the performance of their proposed approach with two rule-based baselines: Unif and Stopword. Unif encoder randomly keeps tokens to generate keywords with the probability $\delta $. Stopword encoder keeps all tokens but drops stop words (e.g. `the', `a', `or') all the time ($\delta =0$) or half of the time ($\delta =0.5$).
